intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I'm a fullstack developer based in Paris, specializing in building modern web applications, robust microservices, and high-performance software architectures. I'm passionate about technology and innovation and strive to stay updated with the latest software development trends. My expertise includes technologies like Spring Boot, Kotlin, Java, React, and more. I'm also a strong advocate for best development practices such as TDD, DDD, and Agile methodologies.

LuxuryLeader.achievements: Developed web, mobile (PWA), and logistics microservices in React & Spring Boot.;Built internal tools (SDKs, libs, starters).;Production application support.;Technical lead for applications and microservices.;Tech migrations and quality practices (TDD, DDD, Pair/Mob Programming, etc.).;Onboarding of new developers.;Led bi-weekly technical meetings.;Provided technical advice on architectural decisions.;Managed 2 team members.;Internal speaker on Kotlin & reviewer for Hibernate training.

TakimaRH.achievements: Developed Hui application for HR event management.;Split Hui from the Itewa application.;Wrote SQL scripts for new data schema.;Developed SAP synchronization CRON jobs.;Integrated with Google Sheets via API.;Developed unit and integration tests.

TakimaFormation.achievements: 10-week intensive internship covering 13 fullstack development chapters.;Topics included: Java, Kotlin, Spring, React, DevOps, TDD, CI/CD, GDPR, NoSQL, etc.;Built a fullstack marketplace.;Learned agile methodologies and best development practices.

Atos.achievements: Built an internal PWA for mission tracking in Angular & Spring Boot.;Gathered user needs through interviews.;Handled complete design (mockups, data models, architecture).;Fullstack development and security with Spring Security.;Implemented backend tests and password encryption.;Worked autonomously through the entire project cycle: analysis, development, deployment.
